name: Turbo Turns (#TweetTweetJam Edition)
description:
My #TweetTweetJam 2 entry is: Turbo Turns TTJ
(A clone of the "Turbo Turns" level from Micro Machines 2, in under 560 chars and uses no art assets!)

CONTROLS:

  • Turn   = ◀ /  ▶
  • Brake = [Z]

GAME:

  • Complete 3 Laps as fast as you can
  • Avoid falling off the track, as it'll slow you down
  • Use the brake to control yourself (...but not too much!)

Don't forget to share screenshots of your best Times using hashtag #TurboTurnsTTJ

🏎️💨🥤🥫
